featured.text: In addition, the songs are seemingly trying to work some magic—as if, by singing, the mother is saying, “Sadness has already touched this house; no need to come by again.” 53.
Many scientists, however, say there is no evidence that Blue Monday causes any more sadness than other specific days of the year.

definition.zh_def: 悲傷是一種情感，通常由失去、失望或痛苦引起。
definition.en_def: Sadness is an emotional state characterized by feelings of sorrow, disappointment, or loss.
definition.example: She felt a deep sadness after saying goodbye to her friend.
